arts.sum: Xabi Alonso’s side are searching for a first real result against their fierce rivals in El Clasico in four meetings

arts.ttl: Real Madrid hosts Barcelona in league clasico trying to end run of 4 straight losses to rival
arts.sum: The first clasico of the season takes place with Real Madrid hosting Barcelona in the Spanish league looking to stop a four-game losing steak against the Catalan rival. Raphinha netted five of the 16 goals that Barcelona scored in the four matches against Madrid last season.

However, unlike last season, the Catalan giants will likely have a much harder time beating Los Blancos in this fixture. arts.ttl: Stats: Real Madrid talisman enjoys stellar goalscoring record against Barcelona
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe, by far, is Real Madrid’s most lethal weapon heading into El Clasico. The Frenchman, after all, has completely carried the team’s attacking department on his shoulders so far this season.
